Dennis Deng

AI/Data Solutions Architect & Engineer

San Francisco, CA | 415-657-6095 | tmacdennisdddd@gmail.com

Professional Summary

AI/Data solutions Architect/Engineer with over 17 years of experience designing and deploying AI/Data infrastructure and AI/Data-driven solutions for global enterprises. Proficient in AI/ML frameworks (PyTorch, LangGraph, Hugging Face), hardware accelerators (GPUs, TPUs, NPUs, CPUs), and containerized deployments (Kubernetes, Docker). Skilled in delivering technical presentations and workshops to diverse audiences, driving adoption of AI solutions. Holds a MS in Data Science and multiple AI/Data certifications.

AI/ML Frameworks

PyTorch, TensorFlow, LangChain, LangGraph, vLLM, Llama Factory, Hugging Face, scikit-learn

AI Infrastructure

GPUs (A100/H100/L40/4090), distributed computing, model fine-tuning, ETL pipelines

AI Models

LLaMA, BERT, Deepseek, Qwen, Gemma, LSTM, GAN, Stable Diffusion, LLava, Sklearn

Data Engineering

Spark, Kafka, DBT, Hadoop, Clickhouse, Apache Iceberg, Minio, DuckDB, Polars

Professional Experience

Tevo Corporation, AI Solutions Architect

2023 - Present

  • Engineered LLM solutions with vLLM and Llama Factory, optimizing inference and fine-tuning (SFT, PPO) for models like LLaMA and Deepseek on A100/H100 GPUs, achieving low-latency, scalable deployment.
  • Developed a transportation data recognition system with 99% machine text and 95% handwritten text accuracy, leveraging Table Transformer, YOLO, and VLM hybrid models on AWS.
  • Built a human-aided Omnichannel AI agent system for customer service using LangGraph, reducing human workload by 4x through multi-agent pipelines and distributed inference.
  • Designed an email marketing AI agent with symbolic neural networks and scikit-learn, increasing call-to-action rates by 15% through grounded causal inference.

Ziel Corporation, Principal Data Scientist

2021 - 2023

  • Architected AI-driven sales intelligence tools using BERT-based aspect-based sentiment analysis and knowledge graphs, improving marketing campaign ROI with data-driven insights.
  • Engineered a customer intelligence platform with Rudderstack CDP, leveraging MongoDB and Chroma vector databases for omnichannel segmentation, boosting retention by 20%.
  • Developed a product intelligence platform with PIM/PDM for price intelligence, inventory optimization, and MROI optimization, integrating PyTorch-based models.
  • Built demand forecasting models with Prophet and PyTorch, achieving 75%+ sales forecast accuracy over 6 months, optimized for cloud-based AI infrastructure.

Royole Corporation, Digital Solutions Architect

2014 - 2021

  • Deployed hyper-converged infrastructure using Cisco Hyperledger Fabric, optimizing compute and storage for AI workloads with GPU-based accelerators.
  • Designed high-availability fab and shopfloor networking with Cisco N7, N9, and SDN solutions, ensuring robust AI infrastructure performance.
  • Developed a hybrid Kubernetes cloud and microservices platform with Apache Servicecomb, enabling scalable AI model deployment and reducing deployment time by 30%.

IKEA Trading, IT Solutions Specialist

2012 - 2014

  • Designed and managed Cisco IPT rollout across APAC, engineering telephony solutions with Cisco hardware, improving VOIP quality and reducing costs by 10%.
  • Led Cisco UC adoption with Webex, delivering video conferencing and mobile sync solutions, enhancing communication efficiency by 40%.
